rules_text:
When this land enters, sacrifice it. If you do, search your library for a basic Forest or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
{1}{G}{G}{W}{W}, Discard this card: Create three tapped 1/1 white Citizen creature tokens.
notes:
!tokens white Citizen 11ERR<3>
!

if uncommon: Reified Borough
